website_summaries.verdict: This durable set is a good option for those who use their air die grinder on a regular basis for a range of projects.
pros: Runs smoothly and provides smooth cuts while working quietly
Designed to be lightweight and easy to maneuver
Features conveniently placed rear exhaust airflow system
cons: Tools have a noticeable vibration in hand

website_summaries.verdict: A handy pneumatic die grinder kit featuring a fourth-inch straight die grinder, a fourth-inch angle die grinder, and a versatile set of grinding bits.
pros: The included tools in Astro's kit are quality pneumatic grinders that are capable of impressive power and speed
Both are compact, lightweight grinders with textured handles for a firmer grip
The design of the throttle allows for precision control
cons: The kit could benefit from a more durable collet wrench

customer_reviews.title: Work good
customer_reviews.text: Work as expected on 120 PSI shop air supply. Easily cut through a 5'' diameter exhaust pipe for a semi truck with cutoff wheel. Easily remove axle shaft gaskets and DPF gaskets with angle grinder. Nice and quiet compared to other tools. Overall work good when maintained properly. Used in heavy duty truck shop by professional mechanic. Will update in 6 months or after they break... Whichever comes first
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! the grinders are great, especially for the value. You dont get too much torque with these and they only have a one year warranty, but the feel in the hand is great. They dont get cold like the economy metal handled tools. Theyre fast, compact and light. I just love them. They also dont vibrate in the hand a ridiculous amount like some die grinders ive had. The greatest surprise about this kit was the carbide bits though. I was expecting them to be pretty disposable and overall not that great, but they are wonderful. Very sharp and hard and have held up to everything i have put them through so far.
customer_reviews.author: blake ryals

customer_reviews.title: Great little Die Grinders
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grinders for the money! I don't use these every day, maybe 2-3 times a week in a professional shop. The burring bits I figured were throw away, but they have actually held up really well. As with most any die grinders, I did have to make better wrenches for the collets. I'll be looking at Astro when I buy new tools!
customer_reviews.author: M. Northcutt

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry this is a very late review. But the die grinder kit arrived on time. It was a exactly as advertised. I don’t use it on a regular basis, but when I do - it is great. It’s exactly what you would order off the manufacturer’s site, but a lot less $$$. The minute you pick up the tools, you know they are very well made. You just have to remember the attachments are new and will grap the material quickly and it could get away from you. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: RET

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I received the tools on time, no issues with delivery. I got exactly what I expected. I ordered this set to avoid having to constantly change out the adapters that I use (wire wheel, hub buffer, the standard 3M pad) The only reason I have it four stars is because there is definitely an annoying vibration felt when I use the tools, compared to the ingersoll rand die grinder I’ve had for years that has no vibration.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Hoinkis

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t really ask for anything else! They do the ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t really ask for anything else! They do the job as they are intended to do!! Pros: adjustable speed, adjustable directional exhaust. Only con: the straight die grinder doesn’t have the ability to switch rotations, I knew this when buying them so it still gets a 5 star! This is more a feature for a grinder that is to be used as a cutoff wheel and costs a bit more money, but for this economy set that also comes with decent carbide bits, it is well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Elite Ink and Vinyl

customer_reviews.title: Astro has quality tools very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The safety is easy to pull down to let you get in there and start grinding away, comfortable tools would recommend for anyone buying first time die grinder or looking to replace their expensive name brand junk that “they” won’t warranty..
customer_reviews.author: Mike W

customer_reviews.title: Very nice grinders.
customer_reviews.text: Both grinders work very well. After my old grinder started to fail I thought to invest in theses. Smooth, even operation. I use them in my home shop but could easily see them in a professional shop.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly O.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional millwright, and I was tired of the Harbor Freight $30 grinder that lasted a few months. I ordered this set and so far have not been disappointed. Smooth, and plenty of power.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfsbear

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: They work just like they should. They're fairly quiet compared to others I've used. Although lacking some of the power of some of the more high dollar tools, these are definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: GrayDizzle

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great price, the product is durable and easy to use. They are a bit noisy and require constant oiling so that they operate smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good grinder for the value
customer_reviews.text: Good grinder for the value. Ive had some problems with depressing the lever and nothing happens. But it hasnt been enough to be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: ActionDan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice high speed grinders. Solid wrenches. The burr set is really handy and I've used the small ball burr and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: BossBill

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Come With Built In Threads For Air Fitting!!
customer_reviews.text: For the money you pay, you'd at least expect the tools to come with threads in them to install an air fitting. They came in without any threads, how are you supposed to install an air fitting??? This is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: K11 Adventures

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: both tools work very well. used in a mechanics shop and have help up with no complaints. lots of power, and spin smoothly for good control.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a good product but coud use a bit more torque
customer_reviews.author: DTP

customer_reviews.title: Great for work
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I use them for at a great price
customer_reviews.author: JLuhr

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using mine for about 6 months; no complaints at all. Both run very well for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Use them for work
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality have used them several times already works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat it!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this item! I’m a heavy equipment mechanic, and have been using them almost everyday for months now with no issues! A buddy of mine has Matco die grinders and prefers these over his Matco.
customer_reviews.author: Baylee Watson

customer_reviews.title: but the carbide bit set seems to chip easily, and the 90 degree grinder seems a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: No major problems, but the carbide bit set seems to chip easily, and the 90 degree grinder seems a bit light on power for a new tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Alot of vibration
customer_reviews.text: I like these but they have alot of vibration while using so you may want to wear padded gloves
customer_reviews.author: Christopher F.

customer_reviews.title: Oil before use !
customer_reviews.text: Angle grinder was sticking out the box after a couple squirts of oil all is good.. probably was sitting on the shelf for awhile
customer_reviews.author: geoffryysgarage

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my fabrication job
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome I use them everyday day. Very durable and the adjustable air flow really comes in handy. The bits it came with are pretty good too
customer_reviews.author: JamesG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for the price astro tools are very well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work great.
customer_reviews.text: I build tooling for aerospace been using these for about a year. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: This purchase was an excellent value. Items work well and the price was ...
customer_reviews.text: .This purchase was an excellent value. Items work well and the price was reasonable. Good packaging and prompt delivery
customer_reviews.author: Tay W. Perry

customer_reviews.title: No tightening tool included.
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to review these items but can’t because the tool to tighten the bits was not included!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Kantner

customer_reviews.title: ... my work and they are still going strong very happy that I got this kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my work and they are still going strong very happy that I got this kit . Recommend this for anyone in the automotive trade it has help me do a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Case

customer_reviews.title: Great tools
customer_reviews.text: Have used these grinders for over a year now as a professional mechanic and they work great. Run very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Morr

customer_reviews.title: Great set of die grinders!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these when I got back into mold and die finishing....they work very well, very little vibration, outstanding die grinders!
customer_reviews.author: The Proud Infidel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome die grinders.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Light. Used every day and they seem to hold up well. Good buy - the carbide bits are excellent quality too and at this price are essentially free.
customer_reviews.author: Ihess7

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: put it to work instantly- should have bought it ages ago
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: nice tools
customer_reviews.text: this is a pair of compact, lightweight die grinders that don't consume huge volumes of air - exactly what I was looking for and so far they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for what you get. I've been using both grinders for a couple months now, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Adams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional brand. It met my demand for the job.The price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: David Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: and bend easily. The selection of the bits is nice
customer_reviews.text: Do not over tighten the bit nuts. Otherwise it's a hell to unscrew them and change the bits. The included wrenches are thin and very weak, and bend easily. The selection of the bits is nice, but they wear out pretty quickly. I use these for grinding my bronze sculptures, and the bits became dull in a single use. The grips are nice in hands, and the weight is just right too. Don't forget to use air tool oil before using, every time.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: smooth and quiet tools.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't needed to use it much yet but they are smooth, relalitivly quiet and cut really smooth. So far they work great. Haven't tested relaibility yet though.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Arnott

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Pleased w die grinder and angle grinder time will tell how they hold up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Astro Pneumatic Tool 219 ONYX 3pc Die Grinder Kit w/ 90° Die Grinder, Die Grinder & 8pc Double Cut Carbide Rotary Burr Set
product_meta.description: Astro Pneumatic's 219 ONYX 3pc Die Grinder Kit includes the 1/4-Inch 90-Degree Angle Die Grinder, 1/4-Inch Mini Die Grinder and an 8pc. Double Cut Carbide Rotary Burr Set. Features of this set includes a lever throttle for feathering control, a rib textured handle which provides a firm grip and a rear exhaust air flow system that directs air away from work surface. Additionally the increased motor size provides more power to make completion of work that much easier.
feature_bullets: Rib textured handle provides a firm grip
Rear exhaust air flow system directs air away from work surface
